content.query:
IF EXISTS ( SELECT * FROM sys.external_tables WHERE object_id = OBJECT_ID('dbo.F_SSTParcel') )
    DROP EXTERNAL TABLE dbo.F_SSTParcel
GO

IF EXISTS ( SELECT * FROM sys.external_tables WHERE object_id = OBJECT_ID('dbo.T_SSTParcel') )
    DROP EXTERNAL TABLE dbo.T_SSTParcel
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE dbo.T_SSTParcel (
	[lms_parcel_id] int,
	[lms_parcel_weight] float,
	[lms_parcel_waybillid] int,
	[lms_parcel_orderid] int,
	[lms_parcel_acceptancedate] datetime2(7),
	[lms_parcel_userid] int,
	[lms_parcel_barcode] nvarchar(4000),
	[lms_parcel_endorsement] nvarchar(4000),
	[lms_parcel_volweight] float,
	[lms_parcel_chargeweight] numeric(18,2),
	[lms_parcel_ptype] int,
	[lms_parcel_description] nvarchar(4000),
	[lms_parcel_locid] int,
	[lms_parcel_handoverdate] datetime2(7),
	[lms_parcel_seqno] int,
	[lms_parcel_floorstatus] nvarchar(4000),
	[lms_parcel_consignid] int,
	[lms_parcel_cref] nvarchar(4000),
	[lms_parcel_claimid] int,
	[lms_parcel_duedate] datetime2(7),
	[lms_parcel_coddate] datetime2(7),
	[lms_parcel_disflag] int,
	[lms_parcel_astoreid] int,
	[lms_parcel_mrpflag] int,
	[lms_parcel_nmrflag] int,
	[lms_parcel_consignflag] int,
	[lms_parcel_cmanifest] int,
	[lms_parcel_cbranchid] int,
	[lms_parcel_claimref] nvarchar(4000),
	[lms_parcel_cost] numeric(18,2),
	[lms_parcel_creason] nvarchar(4000),
	[lms_parcel_customerbarcode] nvarchar(4000),
	[lms_parcel_dbshorts] int,
	[lms_parcel_holddate] datetime2(7),
	[lms_parcel_aflag] int,
	[lms_parcel_stationid] int,
	[lms_parcel_dbshortsdesc] nvarchar(4000),
	[lms_parcel_dstatusid] int,
	[lms_parcel_dflag] int,
	[lms_parcel_callprogid] int,
	[lms_parcel_callprogupddate] datetime2(7),
	[lms_parcel_duplflag] int,
	[lms_parcel_lastupdate] datetime2(7),
	[lms_parcel_datevolumised] datetime2(7),
	[lms_parcel_volumiserweight] numeric(18,2),
	[lms_parcel_volumiserlength] numeric(18,2),
	[lms_parcel_volumiserheight] numeric(18,2),
	[lms_parcel_volumiserwidth] numeric(18,2),
	[lms_parcel_volumiserid] int,
	[lms_parcel_pl] numeric(18,2),
	[lms_parcel_ph] numeric(18,2),
	[lms_parcel_pw] numeric(18,2),
	[lms_parcel_totcharge] numeric(18,2),
	[lms_parcel_dontrecalc] int,
	[lms_parcel_containerid] int,
	[lms_parcel_avgvolweight] numeric(18,2),
	[lms_waybill_id] int,
	[lms_waybill_poddate] datetime2(7),
	[lms_waybill_date] datetime2(7),
	[lms_order_id] int,
	[lms_order_hodate] datetime2(7),
	[lms_order_corderno] nvarchar(4000),
	[lms_order_billcustid] int,
	[lms_order_pickupcustid] int,
	[lms_order_delivercustid] int,
	[lms_order_specdel] int,
	[lms_consignment_id] int,
	[lms_consignment_cdate] datetime2(7),
	[lms_consignment_deliverby] datetime2(7),
	[lms_parceldetail_parcelid] int,
	[lms_parceldetail_inservicestart] datetime2(7),
	[lms_parceldetail_deliverby] datetime2(7),
	[lms_parceldetail_servicedays] int,
	[lms_parceldetail_servicetime] numeric(13,4),
	[lms_parceldetail_cutofftime] numeric(13,4),
	[lms_parceldetail_appointment] datetime2(7),
	[lms_parceldetail_nddid] int,
	[lms_parceldetail_custonholdstart] datetime2(7),
	[lms_parceldetail_custonholdend] datetime2(7),
	[lms_parceldetail_splitinitial] int,
	[lms_parceldetail_weekendholidays] int,
	[lms_parceldetail_inbound] int,
	[lms_parceldetail_courierid] nvarchar(4000),
	[lms_parceldetail_serviceid] nvarchar(4000),
	[lms_parceldetail_custaccid] int,
	[lms_parceldetail_broutemasterid] int,
	[lms_parceldetail_broutemasterfromid] int,
	[lms_parceldetail_broutemastertoid] int,
	[lms_parceldetail_leadtimeid] int,
	[lms_bcustomer_id] int,
	[lms_bcustomer_name] nvarchar(4000),
	[lms_pcustomer_id] int,
	[lms_pcustomer_name] nvarchar(4000),
	[lms_dcustomer_id] int,
	[lms_dcustomer_name] nvarchar(4000),
	[lms_users_id] int,
	[lms_users_fullname] nvarchar(4000),
	[lms_users_site] nvarchar(4000),
	[lms_bill_parceltype_id] int,
	[lms_bill_parceltype_description] nvarchar(4000),
	[lms_bill_parceltype_ptype] int,
	[lms_clocation_id] int,
	[lms_clocation_description] nvarchar(4000),
	[lms_dstatus_id] int,
	[lms_dstatus_description] nvarchar(4000),
	[lms_volumiser_id] int,
	[lms_volumiser_locid] int,
	[lms_volumiser_volumisercode] nvarchar(4000),
	[lms_volumiser_volumiserdescription] nvarchar(4000),
	[lms_volumiser_userid] int,
	[lms_volumiser_inlinescale] int,
	[orv_parcel_id] bigint,
	[orv_parcel_lmsid] bigint,
	[orv_parcel_did] bigint,
	[orv_parcel_scandate] datetime2(7),
	[orv_parcel_scanstatus] nvarchar(4000),
	[orv_parcel_scanmode] nvarchar(4000),
	[orv_parcel_claimid] bigint,
	[orv_parcel_courierid] bigint,
	[orv_parcel_moddate] datetime2(7)

	)
	WITH (
	LOCATION = 'Semi Structured Data/OPS/sstparcel.parquet',
	DATA_SOURCE = [synapse_citylogisticsstorage_dfs_core_windows_net],
	FILE_FORMAT = [SynapseParquetFormat]
	)
GO


SELECT TOP 100 * FROM dbo.T_SSTParcel
GO
